mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE board_type = #{boardType} AND deleted = 'N'

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.region_code AS regionCode, b.board_type AS boardType, b.accommodation_id AS accommodationId, a.name AS accommodationName, b.booking_id AS bookingId, TO_CHAR(r.check_in, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS checkIn, TO_CHAR(r.check_out, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS checkOut, b.user_id AS userId, u.name AS userName, u.nickname AS userNickName, b.title, b.content, b.rating, b.views_count AS viewsCount, TO_CHAR(b.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS createdAt, TO_CHAR(b.updated_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS updatedAt, b.deleted, b.likes_count AS likesCount FROM board b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN accommodation a ON b.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id LEFT JOIN reservation r ON b.booking_id = r.booking_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId} AND deleted = 'N'
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, rating = #{rating}, updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE board SET deleted = 'Y', updated_at = SYSDATE WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (board_id, accommodation_id, booking_id, user_id, region_code, board_type, title, content, rating) VALUES ( #{boardId}, #{accommodationId}, #{bookingId}, #{userId}, #{regionCode}, #{boardType}, #{title}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT r.booking_id AS bookingId, a.accommodation_id AS accommodationId, a.name AS accommodationName, a.region_code AS regionCode, TO_CHAR(r.check_in, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS checkIn, TO_CHAR(r.check_out, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS checkOut FROM reservation r JOIN room rm ON r.room_id = rm.room_id JOIN accommodation a ON rm.accommodation_id = a.accommodation_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND r.check_out < SYSDATE AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM board b WHERE b.booking_id = r.booking_id )
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET likes_count = likes_count + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE board SET likes_count = likes_count - 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE board SET views_count = views_count + 1 WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
UPDATE board b SET b.views_count = ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM views v WHERE v.board_id = b.board_id ) WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.name AS accommodation_name, a.accommodation_id AS accommodation_id FROM accommodation a JOIN board b ON a.accommodation_id = b.accommodation_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId}
